attributes.action: Create Motorway driving license/minimum experience period required to drive on motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be either a minimum period required of driving experience before you are allowed to drive on a motorway and/or drivers should be required to pass a test before they are allowed to drive on a motorway. With all test proceeds going into either funding of cleaner engery or the motorways themselves.
This will help the country of have better and safer drivers.
